de.lambeck.pned.elements

Interface ITransition

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IElement, INode
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IDataTransition, IGuiTransition
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataTransition, GuiTransition

    public interface ITransition
extends INode
    Interface for transitions in the Petri net.
    Author:
    Thomas Lambeck, 4128320

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isEnabled()
      A transition is enabled if:
      - It has at least one input place,
      - All input places have a token,
      - It has at least one output place,
      - Only output places that are input places as well have a token.
      boolean isSafe()
      A transition is safe if:
      - Output places have no token
      - Only output places that are input places as well have a token.

      • Methods inherited from interface de.lambeck.pned.elements.INode

        getName, getPosition, setName, setPosition

      • Methods inherited from interface de.lambeck.pned.elements.IElement

        getId

    • Method Detail

      • isEnabled

        boolean isEnabled()
        A transition is enabled if:
        - It has at least one input place,
        - All input places have a token,
        - It has at least one output place,
        - Only output places that are input places as well have a token.
        Returns:
        The "enabled" state of this transition.

      • isSafe

        boolean isSafe()
        A transition is safe if:
        - Output places have no token
        - Only output places that are input places as well have a token.
        Returns:
        The "safe" state of this transition.
